content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It's now time to get to know the company's main internal systems.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate systems allow employees and the company as a whole to work accurately and harmoniously. It is therefore important to understand which system is designed for what.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The catalog of existing company applications is available on the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://km.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Toolkit\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" page. Conveniently, when you first click on the link, you will see a set of programs predefined for you. You can always customize the Toolkit as you see fit, adding or removing programs from the alphabetical list of applications which is available in All Tools.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Now, have a look at the most important systems which will come in handy from your very first days here in the company:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://library.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Media Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" –  is the company's e-library, where you can find software, books, audio/video resources, and other useful items. Please use VPN or EPAM network to access \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://library.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Media Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA (EPAM Utilization and Project Staffing Analyzer)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – the system for the company's staff management, workload planning for projects, and controlling processes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Service Portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – the system for employee technical support where you can submit requests for work verifications or other official company letters, to have your equipment repaired, to get an ID-card, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pmcmsq.epam.com/pmc/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PMC (Project Management Center)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – the system for project planning, risk management, software development, product quality control, quantitative project management, and processes testing.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://svnmsq.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SVN (Subversion) \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– a free centralized version control system.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://vts.epam.com/epm-vts-web/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VTS (Vacation Tracking System)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – the system for vacation planning and calculation. With the help of VTS, you can create a vacation request and receive your manager's approval.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pmcpct.epam.com/ctc/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CTC (Cost Tracking Center) \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– a web-application to collect and control information regarding company expenses (business trips, product and service purchases, and other expenditures).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Process Asset Library (PAL)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – an internal information resource created to provide access to the approved and existing Quality Management System (QMS) documents at EPAM. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any additional questions, please contact your HR Business Partner.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
